attributes.action: Scrap the proposed motorcycle test for 2008 and come up with a sensible and safe alternative.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The proposed motorcycle test due to come into force in 2008 is both unsafe and unworkable. It needs to be scraped and replaced with a sensible and safe solution to the unaceptably high motorcycle accident rate. The only purpose that the current test scheduled for 2008 will serve is to make it extremely difficult to obtain a licence. The number of accidents during training and tests is also likley to rocket.
